channel.title: How do i get buttons high-lighted?
channel.description: ok i wanna know so when you press a button it becomes high lighted... and you add it self because not all buttons works and you have to add them self so can anyone tell me how to do that?

item.title: How do i get buttons high-lighted?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

like in the interface 2808(when you choose a skill to be advanced when you click on lamp) it doesn’t get high lighted

because you have to code that self so the background of the button is like red as it usually is when you click on buttons

Read full topic
